chat.msg: hey, q tal? empezamos el juego?
yes
brilliant! I'm at the starting line
To my left I see a path that leads to a small island with a tiger. what I do?
take the path towards the tiger
alright, i'm on the tiger's island now
i see a butterfly's island southeast and a bigger island to the southwest with a parrot. where to?
parrot
i'm hanging with the parrot now. i see three rocks toward a new island with a frog and a nearby crocodile
also, there's that big island again with our elephant friend. what's next?
towards the frog and crocodile
cool, i'm on the new island now
it seems there's only one way to the left, towards the elephant. should i go?
yes
back with elly the elephant again
i see a giraffe to the left and a snake southeast. which path buddy?
to the giraffe and then the snake buddy
done and done! just saw my buddy gerry the giraffe, and now i'm with sally the snake
what's next?
get to the treasure buddy
a couple steps east and
voila! I've found the treasure! *finished*
hey there, estas listo?
yessir

alrighty then! take a few steps left under that wooden bench, and across the trail you see the florist stand, but don't go there yet! make a nice sharp u-turn to the left, cross that trail again and head back towards our fluffy white dog
got it?
no
no te preocupes, amigo. párate al lado del perro blanco, ¿ves el banco de madera cerca? Frío. dirígete hacia el banco; pasalo hacia el sendero
pero aquí está lo complicado: no vayas a la floristería todavía. gira rápidamente a tu izquierda y regresa hacia nuestro perro blanco. Probemos eso, ¿vale?
ingles por favor
¡Oh mi error! Entonces, empieza por el perro blanco. ¿Ves el banco de madera cerca de ti? Frío. Dirígete hacia él, pasa por debajo y hacia el sendero.
pero aquí está el giro: no vayas a la floristería todavía. Gire rápidamente a la izquierda y retroceda hacia nuestro perro blanco. intentémoslo, ¿vale?
si
¡excelente! ahora cruzamos el ramal en dirección sur
recuerda seguir bajando por el mapa. Encontrarás otro perro blanco cerca de una manta de picnic a cuadros rojos y blancos.
ok
alright! from the picnic blanket step over it, touch the bowl of berries, and keep heading west, okay?
yes
great, now you're going to cross another branch, this time heading north, crossing the river
can you see it?
yes
fantastic! once you've crossed, you're gonna see a green bush, but don't touch it
instead, circle it from the right side and head towards the florist stand
ok
cool! now turn left, go under the florist stand, and straight ahead towards the big bridge, where two people are riding a bicycle
pass to the west, got it?
yes
fantastic! just past the bridge, you'll see a bench with two elderly folks reading their papers
keep on that path!
ok
nice! now, take a few steps south, between the old folks and another branch, till you reach a green bush right next to the end of the branch
you see it?
yes
brilliant! now, move east, between the branch and the bush
it's practically straight ahead from where you are now!
ok
good job! a few more steps to the east and you'll find something I think you'll like
it's a brown young deer! and voila, we've made it. how do you feel?
fine
that's awesome, mate! i hope you enjoyed that little adventure
ready for another one anytime?
ok
brilliant! can't wait for the next adventure
chat soon!
bye
bye! take care, see you soon!
hola, q tal? ready to play?
yes
nice! i'm at the north in the tent
which way should i go?
south towards the dog and then make a left
gotcha
so i'm now next to this cute pooch by the fire. where to?
go behind the fire and then pass in front of the mushrooms walking towards the blue car
on it! made it to the blue car
what's next, friend?
loop around the bush in front of the car and continue south towards the telescope
aight, i'm at the telescope now
which way to go?
go right when youre below the telescope and cross over the rocks to get to the cabin
made it to the house, friend
we *finished*!
hi there! que comience el juego!!
yes
awesome! let's start. walk under the first palm tree, then make a right, going past the second palm tree
take a big left before you spot the third tree. keep heading south, mate
ok
cool! now, when you see a cute brown puppy, steer left of it
slight left, and then twirl right to the south
ok
alright, now see those two rocks? go between the big rock on your left and the small one on your right
head towards the water, buddy
done im at the crab
good job! now, take a right at the red crab
follow along the big rock, but keep going west in the water
im between the other big rick and the little one below it
nice work! once you spy a medium-sized rock and our sharky friend in the water, swing a right
towards the volleyball?
yeah mate! get back on land, and head between that medium rock and volleyball
continue moving north after that
ok
great, now make a slight left and point towards the north-west
ok
amazing, now you're gonna spot a red tent and a huge speaker
just pass between them. that's the way!
ok
brilliant! now make a nice arc around the tent, no need to hurry
im between the tent and the rock
perfect, now you want to head south towards the sea, but stop right before you get your feet wet
ok
great, now turn right and follow under that red kayak there
dome
done
excellent, now turn 90 degrees to the right - heading north along the kayak and make your way to the small green bush
you made it! that was fun, wasn't it?
fantastic! great job
you navigated that like a pro! i'm pretty impressed. want another round?
